title: LayerPaint HD v1 2 7
description:
- Designed for Tablets (7 inch and over)

[Implemented]

- Pen Pressure Support (Check Settings)
- Open/Save (MDP Format / It opens by FireAlpaca)
- PSD Import/Export
- Foreground color brush, Transparent color brush
- Add Palette, Remove Palette
- Add Layer, Remove Layer, Clipping Layer, Lock Alpha
- Layer Mode (Normal, Add, Multiply, Overlay, Screen)
- Selection Tool (Rectangle, Lasso, Free Transform)
- Bucket Tool (Auto Expand (0, 1, 2 pixel), Enable/Disable AntiAliasing)
- Filter (Hue, Gaussian Blur, Mosaic, Monochrome)
- Navigator (Check Settings)
- Eraser, Move Tool, Fill Rectangle, Gradient

[Testing Devices]

- Galaxy Note 10.1 (2012)
- Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014)
- Nexus7 (2012)
- Cintiq Companion Hybrid
- HTC J ONE
- LG Optimus G (LGL21)
